title: Statically Link Windows Binaries
body: Statically Link Windows Binaries #136 and add support for feature branches

comments.author: mikekinsman
comments.body: ### :x: Validation status: errors File | Status | Preview URL | Details ---- | ------ | ----------- | ------- []() | :x:Error | | [Details](#user-content-) ### []() - **[Error]** Restoring Git repo encounters case-sensitivity conflicts because the repo contains files with name only differing in casing. Please fix the casing conflicts and try building again. Note that if you are working on a Pull Request, please fix the target branch first if the target branch contains casing conflicts. Detected casing conflicts are with following files: samples/Basic/Xamarin.Forms/SkiaSharpSample.Linux.sln, samples/Gallery/Xamarin.Forms/SkiaSharpSample.Linux.sln Learn more: https://aka.ms/gitcase For more details, please refer to the [build report](https://opbuildstorageprod.blob.core.windows.net/report/2018%5C10%5C29%5C81ca5486-8c50-0a94-05c4-486e23e99ecf%5CPullRequest%5C201810292150022983-662%5Cworkflow_report.html?sv=2015-02-21&sr=b&sig=jh3zBL7mqf5aoZ0n3DVfFSC6Vt4R5HG0VGg4bUQfvRA%3D&st=2018-10-29T21%3A45%3A19Z&se=2018-11-29T21%3A50%3A19Z&sp=r). **Note:** If you changed an existing file name or deleted a file, broken links in other files to the deleted or renamed file are listed only in the full build report.
